title: Black Screen
viewing_guidelines: Aboriginal and Islander viewers should note this work may contain images of deceased people and caution should be exercised when viewing.
abstract: Celebrating NAIDOC Week, the National Film and Sound Archive presents four films from its Black Screen Program.
description: Black Screen is an ongoing program that provides free access to contemporary Indigenous Australian films and makes them available to eligible individuals and organisations for use at screening events, festivals and community celebrations. This compilation includes short films and documentaries by renowned Indigenous filmmakers. To showcase Black Screen films at your event or festival please contact Blackscreen at the National Film and Sound Archive.
member_object: Title; B2002766; Black On White Ep. 08. Flour, Sugar and Tea; Active; 2007
